title: Looking for T206 SGC 40 PSA VG 3 in large groups.
author: Brian Van Horn

posts.post_title: Looking for T206 SGC 40 PSA VG 3 in large groups.
posts.post_content:
Gentlemen,

     Looking for T206 SGC 40 PSA VG 3 in large groups. Let me know what you have and the price you are seeking. I do not guarantee a deal, but let's talk.
